short_summary: To procure Ekahau AI Pro software licenses and Wi-Fi diagnostic equipment.
full_summary:

### Tender Description

The proposed requirement is to procure Ekahau AI Pro software licenses and Ekahau Sidekick V2 equipment to improve the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)’s WiFi diagnostic capabilities. The software
